name: RESTORE MONK3
description:
The game fundamentally has the following features

  • Basic Combat System with animation canceling built-in
  • A basic economy system rigged with a shop
  • A set of primate themed enemies
  • The first set of levels representing the first biodome(Planned of 3)
    • Including 2 regular combat levels and a boss level
  • Randomized items which can enhance stats, status effects, and game mechanic changes

More updates to grind out the current bugs will be made in the near future so stay tuned. If you do find bugs, please report them to this google form: >Bug Report Form<
